summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4591 for the improvement of Waverly Place, from McGraw Street to Newton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 53507, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
